entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. How can I help you today?
Yeah, hi. I need to return something. It's a VeloBand Pulse.
Okay, I can certainly help you with that. Can I get your order number please?
Ugh, do I *have* to? It's going to take me forever to find it. Just look up my name. It's Sarah Miller.
One moment, Ms. Miller. Let me see if I can locate your order. Okay, I see here you purchased a VeloBand Pulse. What seems to be the issue?
The issue is, I don't like it! It doesn't do what I thought it would. The sleep tracking is garbage. I want to return it. I bought it like, two weeks ago.
Alright, Ms. Miller. Let me check our return policy for the VeloBand Pulse. Our standard return policy is 90 days, so you should be well within the timeframe for a return.
90 days? Great! Finally, something easy. So, how do I return it? I want my money back, ASAP.

Certainly. I can initiate the return process for you now. I'll send you a prepaid shipping label to your email address on file. Just pack the VeloBand Pulse back in its original packaging, attach the label, and drop it off at any authorized shipping location.
Okay, great. And how long until I see the refund?
Once we receive the returned VeloBand Pulse, it usually takes 7-10 business days for the refund to appear in your account.
Fine. Whatever. Just send me the label. This whole thing has been a waste of my time.
The label has been sent to your email address, Ms. Miller. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
Yeah, actually. I was thinking of getting a different smart watch, something with better sleep tracking. Do you guys have anything like that?

We do offer a wide variety of smart watches. To find one that suits your needs, I recommend browsing our website or speaking with one of our product specialists. Unfortunately, I don't have specific details on which watches have the best sleep tracking capabilities. You could also ask to speak to a manager, they might have more information.
A product specialist? Seriously? This is ridiculous. Just forget it. I'm done with this. Your return policy is the only reason I even bothered calling.
I understand your frustration, Ms. Miller. I apologize for any inconvenience. The return is processed, and you should receive the label shortly. Have a great day.
Yeah, sure. Whatever.
(Click)
Thank you for calling VeloFit...
